participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, loves music and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I like going to rock concerts. On weekends I go out with friends. When I turned 18, my family moved across the country. I grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, enjoys cooking and has a passion for music.
participant_2.background: People say I can cook well. I work at a bar. I can play piano. I like to listen to country music.

content.text: I love going to rock concerts! Do you like any bands in particular?
I love the band Little Big Town! They're great!
I've never heard of them, what kind of music do they play?
They're a country music band. They're really good, you should check them out!
I will! What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is "Boondocks." It's a really catchy song.
I'll check it out! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out with friends and play piano.
Oh, that's cool! I love to play piano too.
Really? What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably classical music.
That's really cool! I've never been able to play classical music.
It's not that hard, you just have to practice a lot!
I might have to give it a try!
You should! It's really fun!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a great job! I love working with kids.
I'm sure you do! They're so cute.
Yeah, they're the best!
